sentences: As soon as dinner is over, professional cooks start working on their next meal.
Likewise, the IPCC started, if only briefly, to consider its future in Valencia.
The IPCC has possibly been the most successful scientific body to inform political processes so far.
With nearly every UN agency and international organization jumping on the climate change bandwagon (including the latest addition, OPEC), the future of the IPCC faces many scenarios.
It is possible that the IPCC will thrive on the increased demand for climate-related knowledge - but it could also be that such demand will stress the IPCC beyond repair.
The IPCC could also benefit from cooperation with numerous other organizations or, on the contrary, face increased competition for resources and expertise.
What the future holds no one knows for sure, but many are already thinking about it.
